title: Pie Crust
steps: Pulse flour, sugar, salt in food processor.
Add butter, pulse until pea-sized pieces remain.
Drizzle in ice water, pulse until dough just comes together.
Divide in half, flatten into disks.
Wrap in plastic, refrigerate at least 1 hour.
Roll on floured surface to 12-inch circle.
Fit into pie plate, trim, crimp edges.
